name: Kanken 準２級 Meaning Quiz
instructions: Type the meaning of the word!

cards.question: 核心
answer: core, heart (of the matter), point, crux, kernel

cards.question: 網羅
answer: encompassing, covering (exhaustively), including (all of), comprising, comprehending

cards.question: 閑散
answer: deserted (esp. store, market, town, streets), quiet, still, hushed, empty

cards.question: 座禅

cards.question: 暁
cards.meaning: あかつき, あかとき

cards.question: 吟味

cards.question: 全廃
